questionTitle: ____ business, a merger is a combination of two or more corporations under one management.
____ of commodities by air began in the 1920s at the same time as airmail service.

anwers: where the French influence the city

questionTitle: A log grabber has a long arm ____, which stretches out to pick up logs.

Sometimes ____ wears people out and is worse than the lack of sleep itself..
